meanings: (말투가 날카로운 모양) snap (at), say sharply[curtly], (informal) bite[snap] one's head off
It is like a shot arrow and spilt water

meanings.meaning: get one's ducks in a row

examples.korean: Activities available include squash, archery and swimming, to name but a few. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 할 수 있는 활동들로는, 몇 가지만 말하자면, 스쿼시, 활쏘기, 수영이 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: I don't care if I fall as long as someone else picks up my gun and keeps on shooting. (Ernesto "Che" Guevara) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 다른 누군가가 내 총을 집어들고 쏘기를 계속한다면, 나는 죽어도 좋다. (체 게바라, 인내명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: I don't care if I fall as long as someone else picks up my gun and keeps on shooting. (Ernesto "Che" Guevara) Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Soldiers held their rifles at the ready to shoot at the enemy. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 군인들은 적에게 쏘기 위해 총을 들고 준비를 한 상태였다. Neungyule

examples.korean: Drive-by shootings, drug trafficking, and graffiti are just a few of the problems that result from gangs. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 차 타고 가며 총 쏘기, 마약 밀매, 낙서는 갱단으로부터 야기된 문제의 일부에 지나지 않는다. Neungyule

examples.korean: Some traditional games played on Chuseok are tug of war, ssireum, archery and gama fighting. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 추석에 흔히 즐기는 민속 놀이로는 줄다리기, 씨름, 활쏘기, 가마놀이 등이 있다. Neungyule
